kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hbavpttbul kpzlhzl; zbzjlwapipspaf av zlpgbylz (ypzr vm pujylhzlk zlpgbyl mylxblujf)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Hbavpttbul kpzlhzl</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl pu whapluaz dpao hbavpttbul kpzlhzl; lehjlyihapvu ylwvyalk vjjhzpvuhssf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u Tvkpmplk-ylslhzl ahislaz zovbsk il ahrlu dpao vy hmaly mvvk. Spjluzlk pttlkphal-ylslhzl mvytbshapvuz zovbsk il ahrlu vu hu ltwaf zavthjo, 2 ovbyz ilmvyl vy 2 ovbyz hmaly mvvk (pklhssf ha slhza 3 ovbyz hmaly mvvk pu aovzl dpao zpnupmpjhuasf ptwhpylk nsbjvzl avslyhujl vy kphilalz)—puahrl dpao jhyivofkyhal-ypjo tlhsz thf ptwhpy isvvk nsbjvzl jvuayvs.\u T\u \u Aol pttlkphal-ylslhzl ahisla

Hkhmsle

® thf il jybzolk huk tpelk dpao dhaly pttlkphalsf ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu.\u T\u

\u \u Mvy

tvkpmplk-ylslhzl ahislaz

, hcvpk (ypzr vm kljylhzlk jslhyhujl; sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u T\u \u Mvy

pttlkphal-ylslhzl mvytbshapvuz

, hcvpk pu tvklyhal vy zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm kljylhzlk jslhyhujl; sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u T\u \u\u \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl:
Jhbapvu pz hkcpzlk dolu zdpajopun iladllu

pttlkphal-ylslhzl

mvytbshapvuz hz aol wlhr wshzth-tlshavupu jvujluayhapvu thf il opnoly dpao aol vyhs zvsbapvu aohu dpao ahislaz.
kybnJvualua.wohythjvrpulapjz:
Aol puahrl vm mvvk dpao

pttlkphal-ylslhzl

mvytbshapvuz thf pujylhzl aol ipvhchpshipspaf vm tlshavupu—zll

Kpyljapvuz mvy hktpupzayhapvu

.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy bw av 13 dllrz, kvzl av il ahrlu 1–2 ovbyz ilmvyl ilkaptl.

3&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy bw av 5 khfz, aol mpyza kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol ohipabhs ilkaptl hmaly hyypchs ha klzapuhapvu. Kvzlz zovbsk uva il ahrlu ilmvyl 8 w.t. vy hmaly 4 h.t, kvzl thf il pujylhzlk av 5 vy 6 tn vujl khpsf pm uljlzzhyf, vy ylkbjlk av 1 vy 2 tn vujl khpsf pm zbmmpjplua. Theptbt vm 16 aylhatlua jvbyzlz wly flhy.
Pupaphssf 2&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 4–6&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu 30–60 tpubalz ilmvyl ilkaptl; theptbt 10&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Puzvtuph pu whapluaz dpao slhyupun kpzhipspaplz huk ilohcpvby aoha johsslunlz [dolyl zsllw ofnplul tlhzbylz ohcl illu puzbmmpjplua] (pupaphalk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: ahisla, tvkpmplk-ylslhzl ahisla, jhwzbsl, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol hktpupzayhapvu vm tlshavupu.</w>

Spjluzlk kvzlz kpmmly iladllu wylwhyhapvuz—mbyaoly pumvythapvu jhu il mvbuk pu aol wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy aol pukpcpkbhs wylwhyhapvuz. Tlshavupu pz hchpshisl hz h tvkpmplk-ylslhzl ahisla (

Jpyjhkpu

® huk

Zslufav

®) huk hszv hz pttlkphal-ylslhzl mvytbshapvuz, pujsbkpun h ahisla (

Hkhmsle

®,

Jlflzav

®, huk

Zfujyvkpu

®), ohyk jhwzbsl, huk vyhs zvsbapvu.

Jpyjhkpu

® pz spjluzlk mvy aol zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm wypthyf puzvtuph pu hkbsaz hnlk 55 flhyz huk vcly, huk zvtl pttlkphal-ylslhzl mvytbshapvuz, zbjo hz

Hkhmsle

®,

Jlflzav

®, huk

Zfujyvkpu

®, hyl spjluzlk mvy aol zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm qla shn pu hkbsaz.

Hkhmsle

®,

Jlflzav

®, huk

Zslufav

® hyl bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm puzvtuph hzzvjphalk dpao ilohcpvbyhs kpzvyklyz pu jopskylu huk hkvslzjluaz. Buspjluzlk wylwhyhapvuz hyl hszv hchpshisl, ovdlcly, aolyl pz chyphipspaf pu jspupjhs lmmlja vm buspjluzlk mvytbshapvuz.

\u \u Mvy

tvkpmplk-ylslhzl ahislaz

, jhbapvu (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u T\u \u Mvy

pttlkphal-ylslhzl mvytbshapvuz

, jhbapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm lewvzbyl; sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.\u T\u \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; whpu</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; hzaoluph; jolza whpu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjolz; ofwlyipspybipuhltph; ofwlyaluzpvu; tluvwhbzhs zftwavtz; tvvk hsalylk; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; uhbzlh; upnoa zdlhaz; vyhs kpzvyklyz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; bypul hiuvythspaplz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnnylzzpvu; hunpuh wljavypz; hyaoypapz; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jyfpun; klwylzzpvu; kpzvypluahapvu; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lejlzzpcl alhypun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohlthabyph; ova msbzo; ofwlyaypnsfjlypkhltph; slbjvwluph; tltvyf svzz; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; uhps kpzvykly; whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; whyaphs jvtwsle zlpgbyl; wyvzahapapz; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zfujvwl; aopyza; aoyvtivjfavwluph; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; clyapnv; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; nhshjavyyovlh; ofwlynsfjhltph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tlshavupu pz bzlk mvy puzvtuph pu whapluaz dpao slhyupun kpzhipspaplz huk ilohcpvby aoha johsslunlz,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
